title: Aztec Ruins National Monument: Parks as Classrooms
body: Parks as Classrooms        Curriculum Materials Find lesson plans to bring ancestral Pueblo culture alive in your classroom.  The lesson plans were developed by local teachers, National Park Service rangers, modern Pueblo people, and other subject-matter experts.   All Curriculum Materials     Field Trips Plan a free field trip to Aztec Ruins!  Activities in the park include touring the archeological site, watching the video, and visiting the museum.  Please call ahead so that park staff can prepare for your visit and offer planning guidance. All Field Trips     Guest Speakers Rangers are available to visit your classroom and give educational programs on a variety of topics. All Guest Speakers
